name: Personalized Metal Bucket with matching Water Bottle - Easter Basket or Room Decor
description:
The perfect Easter basket with a matching sports bottle, great size for Easter egg hunts!

5 QUART 8" dia x 6 3/4" tall Metal bucket personalized with your child's name, initial or monogram in high quality vinyl. Choose your vinyl colors. Item shown is decorated with name and polka dots. Sports bottle available in blue, pink, purple or yellow. This can be decorated to match a child's room for use after Easter. Ribbon bow may vary but will coordinate with your choice of vinyl color.

Visit my blog for ideas: www.debideladesign.blogspot.com
Contact me if you have any questions or special requests.

Listing is for 1 bucket and 1 sports water bottle of your choice. 
 
When ordering specify:
color of bucket
color of water bottle
name, monogram or saying
font (example shown is "swirls")
name color
polka dots colors
